product_name: Icebreaker Anatomica Crew Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: Wear the ultralight Icebreaker Anatomica Crew long underwear top as your base layer in cool weather and stay comfortable in the warm, insulating softness of ultralight merino wool. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool, the Icebreaker Anatomica crew long underwear top offers very light warmth and resists odors naturally. Ultralight merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly and breathes well. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Set-in sleeves and flat seams reduce chafing. Machine washable; line dry or dry flat in shade. Icebreaker Anatomica Crew long underwear top has a slim fit.
short_description: Wear the ultralight Icebreaker Anatomica Crew long underwear top as your base layer in cool weather and stay comfortable in the warm, insulating softness of ultralight merino wool.
